Not sure it has been suggested before but what do you think about adding fractional time warp values, i.e. slo-mo?

The two uses I can imagine straight away would be:
- easy mode e.g. for aircraft or lander landings/hopping
- considering how the faster you warp the lower the FPS, this may actually increase FPS (especially in crucial moments) for folks with lower specs

Edited January 26 by DailyFrankPeter

Yes, I would like this.

 

Related, I don't think the 2x is useful, going from 1x to 4x to 10x is granular enough.

There are two near log sequences I like to use in some of my code:

  • 1,3,10,30,100,...
  • 1,2,5,10,20,50,100,...

these sequences give a good feel, as they are close to log, but still have human readable numbers. Note, how the 2nd is used for Euro currency for the same reason.
